sentences: Christina T. Lopez (born April 18, 1981), better known by her stage name T Lopez, is an American singer, speaker, TV host, producer and writer from Ontario, California.
T Lopez was a former member of the Latina group Soluna.
As a solo artist, T Lopez signed a record label deal with Cash Money Records and Universal Republic Records.
